detail_desc: Shirt in a cotton weave with a button-down collar, classic front and yoke at the back. Open chest pocket, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.

Single-breasted jacket in a textured weave made from a cotton blend with narrow notch lapels, a decorative buttonhole and imitation suede elbow patches. Chest pocket, flap front pockets and an inner pocket with a button. Fastening with two buttons at the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Partly lined. Slim Fit – a fit that tapers at the chest and waist which, combined with slightly narrower sleeves, creates a fitted silhouette.
5-pocket, slim-fit jeans in stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button, and flared hems. The jeans are made partly from organic cotton.
Dungaree shorts in washed cotton twill with press-studs down the front and frill-trimmed straps with adjustable fasteners at the front. One open back pocket and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Sleeveless dress in a crêpe weave with decorative, overlocked seams, a seam at the waist and concealed zip at the back. Unlined.

Blouse in twill made from a cotton and modal blend with a V-shaped opening at the top and a small, smocked stand-up collar with twisted ties at the front. Long raglan sleeves with smocking at the cuffs.
Short, fitted off-the-shoulder dress in stretch ribbed fabric. Short raglan sleeves and a seam at the waist with a gently bell-shaped skirt that flares to the hem. Unlined.
Shirt in raw denim with contrasting colour seams, a wide collar and buttons down the front. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, flap chest pockets and a wide tie belt at the waist.
Cotton jersey briefs in various designs with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Ankle-length trousers in a stretch weave with a regular waist and fly with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener. Fake welt pockets at the front, a fake back pocket and tapered legs with creases.
Blouse in airy cotton voile with a small frilled collar and concealed button placket. Gathered yoke front and back and short, butterfly sleeves. Unlined.

Short, fitted dress in woven fabric with a slight sheen. Square neckline, a jersey lining at the top, gentle draping over the bust and an open back with lacing. Concealed zip in one side and 3/4-length puff sleeves with covered elastication over the shoulders and wide smocking at the cuffs. Unlined.
Wide top in airy, soft jersey made from a nepped viscose and linen blend with a gentle V-neck and dropped shoulders.
Straight-cut top in sequined mesh with a round neckline, short sleeves and short slits in the sides. Jersey lining.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in soft jersey with a collar and button placket.
Sleeveless dress in printed cotton jersey with a gathered seam at the waist and flared skirt.

Biker jacket in soft imitation leather with a collar with faux fur on the top and decorative press-studs. Diagonal zip down the front, zipped side pockets and long sleeves with a zip at the cuffs. Lined.
Knee-length satin skirt with a high waist with wide elastication and a detachable tie belt, and side pockets. Unlined.

prod_name: lace it like that swimsuit plu
detail_desc: Fully lined swimsuit with a textured finish, triangular padded cups and lacing at the top. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps that can be fastened in various ways.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a motif, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
V-neck swimsuit with double, narrow shoulder straps decorated with metal beads, and padded cups with removable inserts. The shoulder straps join at the back. Lined.
Jacquard-knit socks in a soft cotton blend in various colours and designs.

Jacket in stretch denim with hard-worn details that are patched on the inside. Collar, buttons down the front, flap chest pockets with a press-stud, and buttoned cuffs. The cotton content of the jacket is partly recycled.
Thong briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset and string back.

Negligee in an airy weave with lace, mesh-lined cups with removable inserts. Double, adjustable shoulder straps, a hook-and-eye fastening at the back, an elasticated seam under the bust and flare to the hem.
Vest top in patterned cotton jersey.
Trunks in stretch organic cotton jersey with flatlock seams for added comfort, an elasticated waist, lined front and slightly longer legs.
Sleeveless blouse in woven fabric with a small stand-up collar with a button and a V-shaped opening at the top. Draped, decorative flounce trim down the front and a rounded hem. Lined front.
Knee-length shorts in soft, washed cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, side pockets and a fake welt back pocket.
Scarf in a patterned weave that can also be tied as a hairband. Size 50x50 cm.

Ankle-length trousers in woven fabric with a regular waist, hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Diagonal side pockets, fake back pockets and slim legs with creases. The polyester content of the trousers is partly recycled.
Gloves in a soft, fine knit with ribbed cuffs. One pair with a print motif on the uppers.
Sleeveless, round-necked top in woven fabric with a sheen. Opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck and short slits in the sides. Lined.
Brazilian briefs in soft jersey with lace trims, a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and half-string back. The cotton content of the briefs is organic.

Set with a long-sleeved bodysuit, pair of leggings and accessory in soft organic cotton jersey. Bodysuit with press-studs at the crotch and a print motif on the front. Leggings with foldover ribbing at the waist.
Short satin shorts in a viscose blend with an elasticated waist and wide tie belt. Fake fly, side pockets and a fake welt pocket at the back.
Jumper in a soft, textured knit with a roll-edge neckline, long sleeves and a rounded hem with slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Shorty wetsuit with a V-neck, cut-out section at the front and long raglan sleeves. Zip with a long tab at the back. Lined at the front.
Blouse in a soft textured cotton weave with an opening and button at the back of the neck and frill-trimmed cap sleeves.
Jumper in a soft, textured-knit cotton blend with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Single-breasted jacket in a stretch weave with narrow notch lapels, a chest pocket, flap front pockets and an inner pocket. Decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Skinny Fit – a slightly shorter style that shapes in at the chest and tapers sharply at the waist. This combined with narrow shoulders and sleeves creates a completely fitted silhouette.

Bag in imitation leather with an adjustable strap that closes with a metal chain and carabiner hook so that you can easily fasten it around your waist or over your shoulder. Zip at the top and two small outer compartments with a zip. Lined in woven fabric made from recycled polyester.
Hat in a soft, rib-knit alpaca and wool blend with a sewn-in turn-up at the hem.
Sleeveless top in jersey crêpe with a small, gathered stand-up collar, V-shaped opening at the front and rounded hem.
Make-up bag a zip at the top that continues down the short sides. Lined. Size approx. 7x11.5x18.5 cm.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a high waist with wide elastication.
Sandals with narrow straps and covered block heels. Imitation leather insoles.
Trainers with a padded edge and tongue, elasticated lacing, a hook and loop tab at the front and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles.
Top in soft pile with a drawstring hood, zip at the top and long raglan sleeves with thumbholes at the cuffs. Kangaroo pocket and a drawstring at the hem.
5-pocket shorts in soft washed denim with a regular waist and slightly longer legs with sewn-in turn-ups.
Knee-length, fitted skirt in patterned jersey with a high waist with concealed elastication, a seam centre front and slit at the hem.
Long-sleeved top in soft, printed cotton jersey with a round neck, concealed press-stud on one shoulder and a rounded hem with short slits in the sides. Longer at the back.
Suede trainers with a padded top edge and lacing at the front. Fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles.

prod_name: SB Samuel water repelle jkt TP
detail_desc: Padded jacket in a water-repellent weave with a padded, detachable hood, stand-up collar, zip down the front with a chin guard, and side pockets with a press-stud. Reflective details. Partly lined in fleece. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Cardigan in fine-knit cotton with buttons down the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Cotton jersey vest top with a print motif on the front.
T-shirt in printed cotton jersey.
5-pocket jeans in washed cotton denim in a relaxed fit with a zip fly and button, and tapered legs. The jeans are made partly from recycled cotton.
Fully lined, waist-high bikini bottoms with flounces at the sides and a high cut at the back.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a back pocket. Soft brushed inside.
Sleeveless blouse in an airy viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back.

Jeggings in washed denim with a stretch function enabling the jeggings to hold their shape. Regular waist with covered elastication, fake front pockets, a coin pocket, real back pockets and skinny legs.
Short-sleeved blouse in woven fabric with a V-neck, zip with a ring pull at the top and narrow, covered elastication at the hem.
Fine-knit knee socks in a soft cotton blend with a high shaft that ends at the knee.

Blouse in an airy weave with a small stand-up collar, V-neck, button placket and chest pocket. Gathered yoke at the shoulders and back, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Sleeveless, calf-length dress in jersey crêpe with a low-cut neckline at the back and double, narrow shoulder straps that cross at the back. Seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Lined at the top.
Long sleeveless dress in soft viscose jersey with a print motif and elasticated waist. Longer at the back.
Long-sleeved tops in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and short slits at the hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Lined triangle bikini top with moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Ties at the back and back of the neck. Light lift.

Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a high waist and wide waistband to hold in and shape the waist. Sculpting seams at the back that showcase the body’s physique. Key pocket in the waistband.
Wide Alice band covered in gathered satin. Width 4.5 cm.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button, and slim legs.
Trousers in a soft knit with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly with decorative buttons, and ribbed hems.
Short, sleeveless jersey top with metal eyelets and lacing at the front.

Calf-length wrapover skirt in a crêpe weave made from a Tencel™ lyocell blend with a concealed fastening at the waist and grosgrain ties at one side. Pockets in the side seams and a slit in the sides. Lined.
Treggings in sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Treggings in sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft, cotton knit with a zipped sleeve pocket and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Short dress in a jacquard weave with a slight sheen. Double-layered stand-up collar and an opening at the back with concealed hook-and-eye fasteners at the back of the neck. Short, raglan puff sleeves with narrow elastication at the hems, and a seam at the waist with a narrow drawstring that ties at the back. Lined.
